title: First Time in Love
description: Do you remember the very first time you realize that you love someone of the same sex? I do. And this is my story about it...Even though this is primarily a love story, it contains explicit homosexual acts between consenting adults. While this is a work of fiction, most of it is based on real experiences from my most recent two years at college and so the names of the characters have been changed to preserve anonymity.
author: James Benedict Noble
